subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Playing in his 100th career final, Roger Federer held off a resilient Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Sunday, 6-3, 6-7 (6), 6-3, for his record sixth ATP World Tour Finals title at the season-ending tournament in London.
snippet: Playing in his 100th career final, Roger Federer held off a resilient Jo-Wilfried Tsonga on Sunday, 6-3, 6-7 (6), 6-3, for his record sixth ATP World Tour Finals title at the season-ending tournament in London.
